short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tokencall : Actionable events for your Crypto and NFT tokens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tokencall is an extension that provides you actionable updates for your crypto and NFT tokens without needing to be glued to Discord or Twitter. Just open up your browser and you can easily see if you have anything to do right away (airdrops, claims, mints, events). 

Tokencall also helps you know that you are receiving action events from the verified smart contract itself, not a hacked Discord or Twitter message that could scam you. 

Connect your wallet to https://tokencall.xyz and then sign in to the extension where you can follow your tokens for actionable events and have them waiting for you when you open your browser. 

Tokencall currently works with Ethereum and Solana.
